Package sam.display

Class Summary
display The graph demo demonstrates basic graph editing and layout functionality, illustrates the key points of the graph architecture.
inputSite BoundsSite is the local class that implements editable sites of Rectangle objects.
outputSite outputSite is the local class that implements editable sites of Rectangle objects.
samBaseFigure A pluginFigure is a graphical representation of the plugin with one input site on the left side for each subscription and one output site on the right side for each publication.
samBaseSite  
samConnector A Connector that draws itself in a straight line.
samEdgeRenderer A sam specific implementation of the EdgeRenderer interface.
samGeometry BoundsGeometry is a class that provides support for manipulating the bounds of a figure.
samGraphController A basic implementation of GraphController, which works with simple graphs that have edges connecting simple nodes.
samJGraph A graph widget analagous to java.swing.JTree.
samLayout A level-based layout algorithm originally implemented by Ulfar Erlingsson at Cornell/RPI and modified to fit into this system.
samRenderer A factory which creates and returns a NodeFigure given a plugin node to render.
samTarget A connector target that returns sites on the figures.
societyFigure A societyFigure is one that contains a single instance of Shape.
